name: Jamf
description:
This plugin is used to fetch devices from the Jamf Security Cloud platform > Devices > Manage page. It also supports performing the Override Risk Level and Revert Risk Level action on devices.

Netskope normalization score calculation: Risk Level Secure = 875, Risk Level Low = 875, Risk Level Medium = 625, Risk Level High = 375.

**Note**: Scores are based on the median of Netskopeâ€™s risk score ranges, e.g., Low (751-1000) has a median of 875.

configuration.label: Base URL
configuration.description: Base URL of Jamf instance. e.g. https://api.wandera.com

configuration.label: Application ID
configuration.description: Application ID generated from the Jamf platform. Application ID can be generated from the 'Integrations > Risk API > Generate API Key'.

configuration.label: Application Secret
configuration.description: Application Secret generated from the Jamf platform. Application Secret can be generated from the 'Integrations > Risk API > Generate API Key'.
